title: New: Rossi – War Within
content: Since stumbling across Rossi’s magnificent debut track Ossetia a couple of weeks back, I’ve been cautiously awaiting more new music, and their second offering War Within doesn’t disappoint. A delectable acoustic number, it’s fragile yet somehow completely overwhelming, with Kendall Morgan’s vocals proving utterly stunning as she yearns for understanding “barefoot in the snow, where am i to go, when everything beneath me melts”. Once can be chance, but twice is an undeniable assertion of genuine talent, and Rossi have that in abundance. Check out War Within below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
